place.name: LITTLE WELDON
place.gazetteerText: Weldon, Little, township and vil., Great Weldon par., Northamptonshire - township, 1330 ac., pop. 454; the vil. is in NW. vicinity of Great Weldon. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
